Package edu.monash.fit2099.game

This module is about all the functionality specific to the Mario edu.monash.fit2099.game we are developing.

This module keeps track of ALL related classes, packages, interfaces, enums and abstract classes related to the Mario edu.monash.fit2099.game. In this module, there are two classes not in individual packages: 1) The driver class Application 2) The Utils class This is because Utils class is a standalone class that is used by most other classes just for its methods Also, the driver Application class is the class starting the program, thus it should be placed outside of all the individual packages.

Since:
1.0.0
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the Mario World edu.monash.fit2099.game.
    Monologue
    The class to handle all Monologues of speakable actors.
    Utils
    This class represents a utility class which essentially generates a random number which is used to account for probability in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
